abstract.text: Recurring leaderboards are a great way to encourage players to keep coming back to your game. Code along with us as we take you through how to set up a recurring leaderboard, both within App Store Connect and in your game itself.

abstract.text: Level up your Game Center integration and enable players to compare scores on leaderboards, earn valuable achievements, and engage with other players.
